item.title: Select All button for code and scar tags
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

This would really be handy. This way we do not need to try to copy all the code and end up missing a little or whatever other reasons.

JavaScript Source: http://www.javascriptkit.com/script/script2/selectall.shtml

Put this inbeteween the tags. I guess you can remove the comments lol.

<script language="Javascript">
<!--

/*
Select All script- By JavaScript Kit(http://www.javascriptkit.com) 
Over 400+ free JavaScripts here!
*/

function selectAll(theField) {
var tempval=eval("document."+theField)
tempval.focus()
tempval.select()
}
//-->
</script>

and for your code and scar tags…

<form name="test">
<a href="javascript:selectAll('test.select1')">Select All</a><br>
<textarea name="select1" rows=10 cols=20>This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.</textarea>
</form>

Thanks for considering!

~Ron
